sqlMap.select:
SELECT PRO.ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, (SELECT SUM(BI.ZC_BI_BCJS_SUM) FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI BI WHERE BI.Zc_HT_Bi_No = PRO.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ) AS ZC_BI_USED_SUM,ZC_BI_NO, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_DO_SUM, (SELECT nvl(SUM(hi.zc_bi_bcsy_sum),0) FROM Zc_Xmcg_Ht_Bi hi WHERE hi.zc_pro_bi_seq = PRO.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ) AS ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM, BI_TARGET_CODE, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, DEC_MONEY, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE, INCEPTDOC_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, ND, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE, SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE, ZC_SAVE_NUM, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE,ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,SUPPLEMENT_AMOUNT,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ,ZC_USE_BI_ID,bt_name,gb_name FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI PRO
PRO.ZC_MAKE_CODE=#zcText0#

SELECT PRO.ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, (SELECT SUM(XMCG.ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM) FROM ZC_XMCG_HT_BI XMCG WHERE XMCG.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ = PRO.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ) AS ZC_BI_USED_SUM,ZC_BI_NO, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_DO_SUM, ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM, BI_TARGET_CODE, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, DEC_MONEY, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE, INCEPTDOC_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, ND, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE, SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE, ZC_SAVE_NUM, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE,ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,SUPPLEMENT_AMOUNT,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ,ZC_USE_BI_ID,bt_name,gb_name FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI PRO where 1=1
PRO.ZC_MAKE_CODE=#zcText0#
PRO.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ=#zcText1#

sqlMap.select:
SELECT PRO.ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM AS ZC_BI_USED_SUM,ZC_BI_NO, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_DO_SUM, ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM, BI_TARGET_CODE, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, DEC_MONEY, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE, INCEPTDOC_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, ND, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE, SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE, ZC_SAVE_NUM, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE,ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,SUPPLEMENT_AMOUNT,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ,ZC_USE_BI_ID,bt_name,gb_name FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI PRO
PRO.ZC_MAKE_CODE=#zcText0#
sqlMap.update: update ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI set ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcTempMakeCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select ZC_BI_NO, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, nvl((select sum(CANUSE_MONEY) from vw_budget_gb where SUM_ID=ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI.ZC_BI_NO),0) + nvl(ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM,0) ZC_BI_DO_SUM, ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM, BI_TARGET_CODE, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, DEC_MONEY, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE, INCEPTDOC_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, ND, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE, SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE, ZC_SAVE_NUM, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE,ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,SUPPLEMENT_AMOUNT,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ,ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM as ZC_BI_USED_SUM,ZC_USE_BI_ID,bt_name,gb_name from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI where ZC_MAKE_CODE=#value#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI where ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI.ZC_MAKE_CODE = #value#
sqlMap.select: select max(ZC_USE_BI_ID) from (select ZC_USE_BI_ID from ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI where ZC_USE_BI_ID like #value#||'____' union select ZC_USE_BI_ID from zc_xmcg_ht_bi where ZC_USE_BI_ID like #value#||'____' ) t

SELECT PRO.ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM AS ZC_BI_USED_SUM, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_DO_SUM, ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM, BI_TARGET_CODE, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, DEC_MONEY, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE, INCEPTDOC_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, ND, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE, SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE, ZC_SAVE_NUM, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_APD_FLAG, ZC_FUND_REMARK, ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID, SUPPLEMENT_AMOUNT, ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_USE_BI_ID,bt_name,gb_name FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI PRO where PRO.ZC_MAKE_CODE =#zcText0#

SELECT PRO.ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM, ZC_BI_JHUA_SUM AS ZC_BI_USED_SUM, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_DO_SUM, ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM, BI_TARGET_CODE, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, DEC_MONEY, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE, INCEPTDOC_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, ND, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE, SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE, ZC_SAVE_NUM, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_APD_FLAG, ZC_FUND_REMARK, ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID, SUPPLEMENT_AMOUNT, ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_USE_BI_ID,bt_name,gb_name FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM_BI PRO PRO.ZC_MAKE_CODE in #pmAdjustCodeList[]#
